about.p1: AI Solutions Architect from 42 Paris, I bridge the gap between deep technical expertise and a Product Builder mindset.
about.p2: Beyond infrastructure (Python, Docker, SQL), I design high-performance, scalable products (Web & Mobile) focused on user experience.
about.p3: Continuous learning via OpenClassrooms, Udemy, Coursera, edX, and community-driven knowledge bases like freeCodeCamp.
about.p4: Trilingual Specialist: RU | EN | FR. Dedicated to optimizing complex systems and building scalable tech solutions for global entities.

projects.title: Simulation: Pokémon OS (Python)
projects.desc: Python-based CLI Pokémon battle simulator featuring ASCII Art and dynamic health bars. Implements advanced OOP principles and ANSI-colored interface for an immersive terminal experience.

projects.title: Module: MadLibs AI (Gen-IA)
projects.desc: Glassmorphism interface for interactive story creation, combining Tkinter logic with AI image generation via DALL-E 3. Features multilingual support and a persistent gallery.

projects.title: Protocol: Data Saver
projects.desc: Built a multi-format export pipeline for data serialization in CSV, PDF, and TXT environments.

projects.title: System: Portfolio Core
projects.desc: Custom holographic web interface featuring high-performance CSS and internationalization (i18n). Includes an interactive terminal emulator and 3D rendering with Three.js.

projects.title: Node: Task-App Deployment
projects.desc: Containerized SQLite management application deployed via Docker Compose for localized data isolation.

projects.title: System: n8n Error Monitoring
projects.desc: Deployment of a centralized error monitoring system on n8n with automated Telegram alerts for proactive DevOps management.
